title: The Valley
brief_description: A before and after story of the pollution of the Ohio River Valley. The pollution included sewage, industrial waste and mining pollution. The controls: monitoring of the rivers conditions, and enforcement of regulations governing the disposal of waste material have contributed to the improvement of the area.
